entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS AROUND 60

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
